translations: 品柱（吉他等的）；（美）分支头目（黑手党或其他犯罪集团的）

sentences.sentence: An empty DE capo. Stoic men are so charming!
sentences.translation: 空虚的重复演奏，不过禁欲主义的男性实在太迷人了！

sentences.sentence: Recently I begin to become very much interested in Da Capo games.
sentences.translation: 最近，我开始变得非常的大卡波游戏感兴趣。

sentences.sentence: CAPO is also responsible for advising Force members on how complaints can be prevented.
sentences.translation: 投诉警察课也负责就如何防止遭受投诉事件，向警务人员提供意见。
